sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Navbars from './Navbars' import './project.css' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { SRLWrapper } from "simple-react-lightbox"; const Project = () => { const options = { settings: { autoplaySpeed: 0, lightboxTransitionTimingFunction: 'anticipate', slideTransitionTimingFunction: 'anticipate', } } return (
Count-Down Timer A vanilla JS application which count downs to new year using "Date" object
Simple Quiz A vanilla JS Quiz application using API fetch await to load questions dynamically.
Recipe A vanilla JS Recipe application to show recipes via keyword or ID search. Favourite recipes can be saved.
Shopping Cart A Shopping Cart application using ExpressJS, MongoDB, Handlebars. User login and registration validated and uses PassportJS and password hashes and stored in DB using Bcrypt-NodeJS. Prevents the Cross-Site Request Forgery(CSRF) attack by using CSURF module. Success and error messages displayed using connect-flash User can add,update delete and checkout products.
Auctioner Auction website using ExpressJS, MySQL and Handlebars. Utilised Fashe theme from colorlib. User login and registration validated and uses PassportJS and password hashes and stored in DB using Bcrypt-NodeJS. Only logged-in user can make bids. Prevents the Cross-Site Request Forgery(CSRF) attack by using CSURF module. Success and error messages displayed using connect-flash. User can add,update delete products to sell and also make bids. Password forgot/reset option via sendgrid implemented.
) } export default Project
